data: When Camelia came down into the country after her second London season, descended lightly upon the home of her forefathers, her coming unannounced, and as much a matter of caprice as had been her long absence, a slowly growing opinion, an opinion that had begun to form itself during Cameliaâ€™s most irresponsible girlhood, became clearly defined, a judgment fixed and apparently irrevocable.
